text: Nima Atrkar Rowshan (Persian نیما عطرکار روشن) (born September 5, 1985) is an Iranian contemporary classical music composer. A compilation of his works "Silence - Rest" is published under Hermes Records in 2012. His works has also been published by Sound Carrier. His music is often described as post-minimal. == Education == Rowshan studied music in Iran & France. He has studied orchestration in École Normale de Musique de Paris with Michel Merlet. He has also received lessons from Alireza Mashayekhi & Mehran Rouhani. == References == == External links == * Official page at Hermes Records * Discography at ITunes Category:1985 births Category:Iranian classical composers Category:Living people Category:École Normale de Musique de Paris alumni
title: Nima A Rowshan
